name: task-manager-server
description: Express.js backend for Task Manager with MongoDB Atlas

scripts.reset-db: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); require('dotenv').config(); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI).then(() => { return mongoose.connection.db.dropDatabase(); }).then(() => { console.log('Database reset complete'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); });"
